original_title: Alex Scott: The Future of Women's Football
overview: Former England international Alex Scott looks at the explosion in popularity of women’s football and asks what the future holds for the game she loves.  Women’s football is the fastest growing female sport in the world. With wages on the rise and multimillion-pound broadcasting deals being agreed, this summer’s European Championships in England are set to be a watershed moment for the game.
title: Alex Scott: The Future of Women's Football
